title: Land with House for Sale at Bodhirukkarama Road, Wellawatte
details:
- Property is located on Bodhirukkarama road (
Vihara Lane ) Colombo 6
- Highly residential and commercial area
- Approx. 130 meters from Galle road
- Walking distance to Galle road
- Just right opposite the Bodhirukkarama temple
- 10 meters from Bodhirukkarama temple to house
- 12 feet road to house
- House details
One storied , 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with
excellent livable condition
